      • getHistoryIds

        public List<Integer> getHistoryIds(long sessionId)
                            throws SQLException
        Gets all the history record IDs of the given session.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of session of the history records to be returned
        Returns:
        a List with all the history IDs of the given session, never null
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while getting the history IDs
        Since:
        2.3.0
        See Also:
        getHistoryIdsOfHistType(long, int...)

      • getHistoryIdsOfHistType

        public List<Integer> getHistoryIdsOfHistType(long sessionId,
                                    int... histTypes)
                                      throws SQLException
        Gets all the history record IDs of the given session and with the given history types.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of session of the history records
        histTypes - the history types of the history records that should be returned
        Returns:
        a List with all the history IDs of the given session and history types, never null
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while getting the history IDs
        Since:
        2.3.0
        See Also:
        getHistoryIds(long), getHistoryIdsExceptOfHistType(long, int...)

      • getHistoryIdsExceptOfHistType

        public List<Integer> getHistoryIdsExceptOfHistType(long sessionId,
                                          int... histTypes)
                                            throws SQLException
        Returns all the history record IDs of the given session except the ones with the given history types.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of session of the history records
        histTypes - the history types of the history records that should be excluded
        Returns:
        a List with all the history IDs of the given session and history types, never null
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurred while getting the history IDs
        Since:
        2.3.0
        See Also:
        getHistoryIdsOfHistType(long, int...)

      • getHistoryList

        @Deprecated
public Vector<Integer> getHistoryList(long sessionId,
                                        int histType)
                               throws SQLException
        Deprecated. (2.3.0) Use getHistoryIdsOfHistType(long, int...) instead. If the thread-safety provided by the class Vector is really required "wrap" the returned List with Collections.synchronizedList(List) instead.
        Throws:
        SQLException

public Vector<Integer> getHistoryList(long sessionId)

        Deprecated. (2.3.0) Use getHistoryIds(long) instead. If the thread-safety provided by the class Vector is really required "wrap" the returned List with Collections.synchronizedList(List) instead.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • delete

        public void delete(int historyId)
            throws SQLException
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • delete

        public void delete(List<Integer> ids)
            throws SQLException
        Deletes from the database all the history records whose ID is in the list ids, in batches of 1000 records.
        Parameters:
        ids - a List containing all the IDs of the history records to be deleted
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if ids is null
        SQLException - if an error occurred while deleting the history records
        Since:
        2.0.0
        See Also:
        delete(List, int)

      • delete

        public void delete(List<Integer> ids,
          int batchSize)
            throws SQLException
        Deletes from the database all the history records whose ID is in the list ids, in batches of given batchSize.
        Parameters:
        ids - a List containing all the IDs of the history records to be deleted
        batchSize - the maximum size of records to delete in a single batch
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if ids is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if batchSize is not greater than zero
        SQLException - if an error occurred while deleting the history records
        Since:
        2.3.0
